title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama to run local LLMs in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models enabling chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) supporting chat, RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server, supports chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI wrapper for Ollama with interactive model picker and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models for semantic search & generative QA.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community extension embedding Ollama LLMs into Camunda 8 worker tasks for process automation.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds local AI assistance for summarizing notes and answering questions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM commands on vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template using Ollama, ChromaDB, and Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for quantized variants of CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, etc.
